channel.title: Secondary suites on Mountain Doodles

item.title: Secondary Suites and Taxes
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I started thinking about secondary suites, laneway houses and taxes in the City of Vancouver. The number of secondary suites and laneway houses has been continuously growing. Rental income is probably one of the main reasons people choose to activate a secondary suite. What are the tax implications? ##Secondary Suites How many secondary suites are out there? Nobody really knows, but we have some estimates.
